en.name: Talking Stick
en.passiveDescription: ATK will be increased by {{16%//20%//24%//28%//32%}} for 15s after being affected by Pyro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s. All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by {{12%//15%//18%//21%//24%}} for 15s after being affected by Hydro, Cryo, Electro, or Dendro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.

zh.passiveDescription: 承受火元素附着后的15秒内，攻击力提升{{16%//20%//24%//28%//32%}}，每12秒至多触发一次；承受水元素、冰元素、雷元素或草元素附着后的15秒内，所有元素伤害加成提升{{12%//15%//18%//21%//24%}}，每12秒至多触发一次。
